content.text: I just found out my coworker was stealing money from the company!
Oh no! That is awful! What are you going to do?
I am not sure yet. I need to tell my boss, but I am not sure how he is going to react.
I am sure he will be upset, but he will probably understand that you had to tell him.
I hope so. I do not want to lose my job, but I also do not want to work with a thief.
I know what you mean. I would be in the same situation.
I am just glad I found out before it got too bad.
Yeah, that is a good thing.
I am going to go tell my boss now.
Good luck! I am sure everything will be fine.
